bill_title: support Governor Mickelson's Pick-Sloan settlement framework.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to support Governor Mickelson's Pick-Sloan settlement framework. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. The South Dakota Legislature supports the Pick-Sloan Missouri River settlement framework, which was established under the leadership of Governor George S. Mickelson, enacted by the Legislature during the 1988 Legislative Session, and codified in chapter 46A-15. 170 copies were printed on recycled paper by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.093 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

action_log.status_text: First read in Senate and referred to
